testcase.classname: Register | users could Register with new account
testcase.name: guest user could Register with valid data successfully

testcase.classname: F02_login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When login with valid "mostafaelsayed98@outlook.com" and "Mostafa19981998"..passed Then user press on login button.............................................passed And user login to the system successfully...................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When login with invalid "mostafaelsayed98@outlook.com" and "Mostafa259".....passed Then user press on login button.............................................passed And user could not login to the system......................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_HomeSlider| users open Slider in home page
testcase.name: first slider is clickable on home page

failure.message: URL of First Slide expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
When click on first slider to direct user...................................passed Then product for first slider is displayed..................................failed

testcase.classname: F04_Currencies | user could switch between currencies [$, €]
testcase.name: guest user can choose € currency
testcase.system-out: When user select Euro from currency dropdown list...........................passed Then All $ sign change to € sign............................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search using product name

failure.message: The following asserts failed: search URL expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure:
Given user click on search bar..............................................passed When user search for product like "Nike"....................................passed And user click on search Button.............................................passed Then user could search successfully and go to search page...................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: The following asserts failed: search URL expected [true] but found [false] at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:47) at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:31) at org.example.stepDefinitions.D05_Search.search_successfully(D05_Search.java:38) at ✽.user could search successfully and go to search page(file:///D:/Ecommerce%20%20Automation%20project/untitled22/src/main/resources/Feature/F05_Search.feature:10)
